text: In today's video we will learn how to use audio, video and media elements in html In our very first video we saw that we can embed videos in html Today I will tell you how to play the video How to keep the video muted And how to enable and disable the video controls Along with that we will see about audio closely How to show media in an overall page So do like this video and stay tuned Because the examples I have used for video tags are very interesting Let's go to the computer screen and roll the intro Friends, this time I have made a folder named video10 And I will not waste your time by opening the code and clicking shift right Infact I will make it in index.html And the topic of today's video is video How to play video in an html file How to insert video, audio and media So adding video is very straightforward I will copy this video tag which has an src attribute And there are some other attributes of this tag Which I will discuss with you guys But first of all I would like to tell you that Video src is equal to video.mp4 So if you have video.mp4 then it will play So let's see I have added video.mp4 And I will preview it by clicking here And you can see that the video is ready Now this is a very big video So what can I do? I can give its width So I can say that width is equal to 555 pixels And as soon as I do 555 pixels Infact I don't need to write px I will just do 555 As soon as we don't need to write px in image We don't need to write px here as well So as soon as I do width is equal to 555 I will do a thing I will do height is equal to 555 So that it becomes smaller Infact I will make it smaller I will do 255 And you can see it has come here Now I will play it Look here, there is a good road from America What's your name? Kupendra Jogi Where have you been in the US? I have been to many places in the US What's your name? Kupendra Jogi So you can play video like this Now there are some attributes of video tag It's very easy to use video tag You should have a video You have to give a path of video After that you have to select controls So you will get these controls You can download it You can full screen it You can mute it You can do picture in picture All this is provided by your browser But let me tell you about some attributes First attribute is src So you must be knowing that Put a video here The name of the video file is src This video file can also come from external url If I have uploaded a video on Amazon s3 I can also put the url there It's not necessary that the video file can be on your computer or server It can also come from third party Now what are the controls? Adds video controls Like play, pause and volume Which we have seen in the video That you are getting the controls here Now the browser automatically sees What will be the control and what will not be in your video Then it will automatically play As soon as the page is loaded So let me put auto play here Now you can see what is happening So you can see that it has auto play So I will remove auto play And the next attribute is loop Which means once our video is played It will loop As I show you So it has started again Once I have finished it It has started again So this loop works like this So you can see that it has started again So you can see that it has started again So you can see that it has started again The next attribute is muted Muted makes the video mute So if I write here Sometimes we want the video to be muted In fact when I add videos here On codewithdry.com And I demonstrate something Like downloading VS code I use the muted attribute Because I don't want the background noise To be heard when I record the video For example I want to show you That this is the element So I will scroll down and highlight it So you can use the muted attribute In your website Then poster, poster is very important So I have an image here Download.jpg If I write here Poster is equal to download.jpg So you can see it looks like this If I play it in the poster The video will play So thumbnail, you can see the thumbnail Of the YouTube video So you can use these attributes Width and height This is the dimension of the video As you can see I have written width and height So I hope you understood this Now After this I want to tell you about audio So this is for all the video attributes It is very straightforward I want you to make a website Which I will give you at the end of this video In a quick quiz So do listen to the quiz I will put the heading here So that I don't forget And this is going to be a fun quiz And everyone should solve this But before that As you write audio You will get src And I will put it in Sachin.mp3 So I will put it in Sachin.mp3 And I will reload it And there is no audio here Which is strange I will put src is equal to And I will write controls So if I don't write controls I won't see audio I will play this audio Sachin what is Sachin Don't ask Sachin So this is our audio If I mute it It won't work So this is Sachin.mp3 audio Now what we will do We will see some audio attributes Src is the source of video file Then controls You know play, pause and volume Which we just saw What will autoplay do? I will automatically play Sachin what is Sachin Don't ask Sachin So what will happen by autoplay Our audio will be automatically played After this Next attribute is loop What will loop do? It will repeat it Sachin what is Sachin Don't ask Sachin Once, second time So you saw it repeated Once it was saved Because I was looping audio So you saw it Sachin.mp3 looped Once it was saved Then it was saved Sachin what is Sachin Because mp3 will be played again and again So there are many use cases When you want mp3 to repeat If you want your mp3 to repeat You can use it After this Muted will mute audio Definitely you don't want Your audio to be muted But sometimes we want The audio to be muted And we can tell the user Who wants to listen Sachin what is Sachin We do this with multiple audio You want to show 5-6 audio together You can mute them The user can play and see So you have control You can use it if you want So I hope you understood this You must have enjoyed A preload The most confusing attribute That's why I have explained it in codewithhari.com Preload attribute Can be these values First value is none This is the default value Preload means If you want the browser To fetch the data Then you will use preload attribute Otherwise you won't use preload attribute Preload is equal to none Preload is equal to metadata Browser will only preload Metadata Information about the audio file It will preload it Auto will preload the entire audio Preload is equal to auto It will download automatically And automatically load So that when the user plays The audio will be saved So this is the preload attribute In interviews we are asked What is preload attribute Before moving forward I want you to share this playlist With your friends As I see the interest is declining As we
